email_text:
Subject: LinkedIn Password Change Confirmation

Dear [Name],

This email is to confirm that your password has been successfully changed for your LinkedIn account. If you did not authorize this change or believe your account has been compromised, please contact us immediately at [LinkedIn support email].

For security purposes, we recommend regularly changing your password and ensuring it is unique and not easily guessable. Additionally, please be cautious of phishing attempts and only log in to your account through official LinkedIn channels.

Thank you for using LinkedIn to connect and network with professionals worldwide.

Best regards,
LinkedIn Security Team
